Headline: No trains between Kimball and Belmont
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Belmont due to police activity at Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Belmont due to police activity at Western.

As a result, trains are operating only between the Loop and Belmont at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Kimball and Belmont to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
